name: Hatsune Miku: Project Diva 2nd - The Idolm@ster Collaboration Pack #1
summary:
The first of two collaboration packs with Bandai Namco's "THE iDOLM@STER SP".
This collaboration pack features the following DLC content:

- "GO MY WAY!!"

- Hatsune Miku Haruka Style

- "765 Productions" Room Theme
- "Hatsune Miku x iM@S Poster" Room Item (Wall)
- "President's Figurine" Room Item (Floor)
- "Nendoroid MEIKO iM@S" Room Item (Shelf)
